text: Pratibha Devisingh Patil (born 19 December 1934) is an Indian politician. She was the first woman to become the President of India serving from 2007 through 2012.Reals, Tucker (21 July 2007). "India's First Woman President Elected". CBS News. Before becoming President, she was the Governor of Rajasthan and served as that from 2004 to 2007. One of her many achievements is Order of Aztec Eagle which she received in 2019. It is Mexico's highest civilian award. == References == Category:Presidents of India Category:Governors of Rajasthan Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Marathi people Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Pratibha Patil
